title: Best of The Program | Guests: Sen. Rand Paul & Nick Rekieta | 11/18/21
description:
Senator Rand Paul joins to discuss Dr. Fauci and his gain-of-function cover-up. Kurt Gladfelter joins with his lawyer Jeffrey Schott to discuss why Kurt was permanently suspended for removing his mask, despite following the health department's rules. Attorney Nick Rekieta joins to give an update on what’s happening with the Kyle Rittenhouse trial and what’s happening with the jury.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
